data.title: That's My Sound, Man - Neil Young
data.meta_description: At this point I'm sure you're sick of my talking about Tears Are Not Enough, the 1985 charity single recorded by a supergroup of Canadian artists, under the name Northern Lights, to raise funds for relief of the 1983–85 famine in Ethiopia. Here's a 2.5 hour deep dive
data.text:
At this point I'm sure you're sick of my talking about Tears Are Not Enough, the 1985 charity single recorded by a supergroup of Canadian artists, under the name Northern Lights, to raise funds for relief of the 1983–85 famine in Ethiopia. Here's a 2.5 hour deep dive with me and Cam Gordon we recorded for my podcast Toronto Mike'd. But there's this one moment, when David Foster is working with Neil Young on his solo, that's become a sort of personal mantra.

"That's my sound, man!" - Neil Young

By the way, in case you're not completely sick of my mild Tears Are Not Enough obsession, here are other Toronto Mike'd episodes that discuss the recording, because these fine people were there.

Liona Boyd

Gord Deppe

Brian Good

Dan Hill

Marc Jordan

Andy Kim

Catherine McClanahan

Murray McLauchlan

Terry David Mulligan

Carole Pope

Lorraine Segato

Jane Siberry

Ian Thomas

Alfie Zappacosta
